Quezon City gov't reports 1,464 COVID-19 cases tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737180 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/737180/quezon-city-gov-t-reports-1-464-covid-19-cases/story/ The Quezon City government on Wednesday reported that, based on information from the Department of Health, the total number of confirmed coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) cases is 1,464. Thu, 07 May 2020 05:25:41 +0800
China's UN envoy: Beat virus before probing its origins tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737176 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/737176/china-s-un-envoy-beat-virus-before-probing-its-origins/story/ China will not invite international experts to investigate the source of the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) until the "final victory" over the virus, Beijing's UN ambassador in Geneva said Wednesday. Thu, 07 May 2020 02:19:47 +0800
WHO warns of new lockdowns, advises proper transition management tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737175 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/737175/who-warns-of-new-lockdowns-advises-proper-transition-management/story/ The head of the World Health Organization (WHO) on Wednesday warned of the risks of returning to lockdown if countries emerging from pandemic restrictions do not manage transitions "extremely carefully and in a phased approach". Thu, 07 May 2020 01:44:43 +0800
Spain lawmakers extend state of emergency tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737174 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/737174/spain-lawmakers-extend-state-of-emergency/story/ Spain's parliament on Wednesday voted to extend the country's state of emergency, allowing stringent coronavirus lockdown measures to remain in place for at least two more weeks. Thu, 07 May 2020 01:36:16 +0800
From Ireland with love : Coronavirus-hit Native Americans repaid for 1847 famine aid tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737173 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/737173/from-ireland-with-love-coronavirus-hit-native-americans-repaid-for-1847-famine-aid/story/ More than $2.6 million has been raised to buy food, water and masks for Navajo and Hopi families hit by the new coronavirus, with Irish people flocking to donate in return for famine aid that Native Americans gave their ancestors 173 years ago. Thu, 07 May 2020 00:58:44 +0800

Thu, 07 May 2020 00:54:53 +0800
Perang natanggap sa SAP, ipinang-pusoy umano sa Laguna tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737172 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737172/perang-natanggap-sa-sap-ipinang-pusoy-umano-sa-laguna/story/ Apat na babae ang naaktuhang naglalaro ng pusoy sa isang bahay sa Calamba, Laguna. Ang dalawa sa kanila, napag-alamang tumanggap ng ayudang pinansiyal mula sa social amelioration program o SAP. Thu, 07 May 2020 00:31:07 +0800
ECQ, balewala sa riding in tandem na nanghablot ng cellphone sa QC tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737168 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737168/ecq-balewala-sa-riding-in-tandem-na-nanghablot-ng-cellphone-sa-qc/story/ Kahit bawal ang magkaangkas sa motorsiklo dahil sa umiiral na enhanced community quarantine (ECQ) sa Metro Manila, malaya pa ring nakabiyahe at nakapang-agaw pa ng cellphone ang riding in tandem sa Quezon City nitong Lunes ng hapon. Wed, 06 May 2020 23:56:09 +0800

Wed, 06 May 2020 23:44:40 +0800
500 tauhan ng isang cruise ship na kinabibilangan ng mga Pinoy, 2 buwan nang nasa laot ng Germany tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737166 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737166/500-tauhan-ng-isang-cruise-ship-na-kinabibilangan-ng-mga-pinoy-2-buwan-nang-nasa-laot-ng-germany/story/ Dahil sa coronavirus pandemic, hindi makadaong at dalawang buwan na umanong nasa laot ng Germany ang may 500 tauhan ng isang cruise ship, na karamihan ay mga Pinoy.
